'''Audrey Hobart''' is the wife of [[Roland Hobart]].


Audrey was in the hospital with her husband, Roland, who was a participant in Derek's Alzheimer's trial. When they learned that his surgery was being cancelled because the trial was suspended, she was extremely upset and begged them just to give him the drug anyway, something Meredith informed her they couldn't do.



She is married to [[Roland Hobart]].


She has two children, Vicky and Jack. She was upset because due to Alzheimer's disease, her kids' father was disappearing.

{{DEFAULTSORT:Hobart, Audrey}}

'''Jack Hobart''' is the son of [[Roland Hobart]].


Jack came to the hospital with his family when his father was supposed to get his injection for the Alzheimer's trial. However, his father's surgery was cancelled when the trial was suspended.



His father has Alzheimer's disease.

'''Roland Hobart''' was a participant in Derek's Alzheimer's trial whose surgery was cancelled when the trial was suspended.


Roland had been diagnosed with Alzheimer's. He was chosen to be part of Derek's Alzheimer's trial, but the day he was supposed to have his surgery, the trial was suspended due to Meredith's tampering and he was sent home, which upset his family.



He is married to [[Audrey Hobart]].


He has two children. Due to his Alzheimer's, his wife said that their kids' father was disappearing.

{{DEFAULTSORT:Hobart, Roland}}
